content: Which file does this setting live in? ig.json, ig.xml, or somewhere else? I'm trying to get the title in the header to pick up that the build is for ballot. Thx.
I'm still seeing ci build in the header on my local build in preparation for populating the ballot site

IIRC, I think there's 2 places for this.
1 the ig.xml has a parameter releaselabel
2 package-list.json

You are probably looking at 1 above. @Nathan Davis
@Lynn Laakso in the publication instructions I think there is a reference to package-list, but I don't think that will change what's on the header
